grid.expression: SELECT DTPREVENT, PAR.NOMEPARC, COUNT(CODPROD) AS QTDSKUS, CODVOL, SUM(QTDNEG) AS QTD FROM sankhya.TGFCAB CAB WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFITE ITE WITH (NOLOCK) ON ITE.NUNOTA = CAB.NUNOTA INNER JOIN sankhya.TGFPAR PAR WITH (NOLOCK) ON PAR.CODPARC = CAB.CODPARC WHERE CODTIPOPER BETWEEN 50 AND 59 AND DTPREVENT = CAST(GETDATE() AS VARCHAR(12)) GROUP BY DTPREVENT, PAR.NOMEPARC, CODVOL
